cleaned_text: District News District News Mark Your Calendar - September 20, 2023 - September 25, 2023 - September 27, 2023 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM [ESS - Community Rush Hiring Events]( https://www.epsnj.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20230927/event/3748) - October 9, 2023 - October 18, 2023 - October 25, 2023 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM [ESS - Community Rush Hiring Events]( https://www.epsnj.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20231025/event/3749) - November 7, 2023 - November 9, 2023 [NJEA Convention and Veterans Day - Schools & District Closed]( https://www.epsnj.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20231109/event/3667) - November 10, 2023 [NJEA Convention and Veterans Day - Schools & District Closed]( https://www.epsnj.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20231110/event/3667) - November 15, 2023 - November 22, 2023 - November 23, 2023 - November 24, 2023 - November 29, 2023 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM [ESS - Community Rush Hiring Events]( https://www.epsnj.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20231129/event/3750) - December 4, 2023 - December 13, 2023 - December 14, 2023 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM [ESS - Community Rush Hiring Events]( https://www.epsnj.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20231214/event/3751) - December 20, 2023 - December 25, 2023 - December 26, 2023 [View Calendar](/Page/2) Community Connect Every Child, Achieving Excellence Our Vision - Elizabeth Public Schools will be one of the highest performing urban school districts in the nation. Our Promise - To provide an innovative and personalized learning environment that ensures that every child achieves excellence. Our Goals - College preparedness, career readiness and 'on-time' graduation for every child.
